data.system_settings: Google Pixel 2 XL // Android 9.0.0 // December Patch // Modded Navbar
data.actual_result: The invite modal page only shoes users you have an open DM with and has misleading failed to find text.
data.expected_result: The invite modal page shows users in your cache.
data.short_description: The suggested people to invite only works if you have an open DM with the user and searching does not look through cache.
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to somewhere where you can create an invite link - Look at the people you can send a message to - Search for someone not on the list, but that's definitely loaded in your cache (quickswitcher should tell you).  - Notice that the search modal says "We've searched far and wide" even though they have not searched *far and wide*.
